award-group.award-id: Lund University Centre of Excellence for Integration of Social and Natural Dimensions of Sustainability

funding-group.funding-statement: This study was supported by the EU project MOTIVE ("Models for adaptive forest management", grant 226544) (Motive-project.net) to KB, EP and MH and the foundation for strategic environmental research programme Mistra-SWECIA to KB. ( www.mistra-swecia.se/en). JP was supported by the Bank of Sweden Tercentenary Foundation programme VBE ("Vetenskap och beprövad erfarenhet" ( www.vbe.lu.se), M14-0138:1) and the Linnaeus programme LUCID ("Lund University Centre of Excellence for Integration of Social and Natural Dimensions of Sustainability" ( www.lucid.lu.se/), FORMAS, 2008–2018). The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
